transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Good morning, ma'am.
Customer: Hello, good morning, sir.
Executive: Good morning, ma'am.
Customer: Ji sir, main company se baat kar rahi hoon Jalandhar se.
Executive: Ma'am, Avnish baat kar raha hoon IndiaMART se, aapko meri aawaz aa rahi hai ma'am?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji, sir.
Executive: Ji, good morning, ma'am, kaise hain ma'am aap?
Customer: Ji, good morning, sir, badhiya sir, aap kaise hain?
Executive: Main badhiya hoon ma'am, aapne jo mujhe sheet bheji thi na, domestic buyleads ki, theek hai?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Haan, main usi pe work kar raha tha.

Executive: To usme ma'am mujhe ab ye bata do, ek baar aap sheet open karenge?
Customer: Jo aapne kal bheji thi maine.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi, jo aapne bheji thi, main aapko reply karta hoon, ye November ka data jo aapne bheja tha mujhe, domestic ke buyleads, ye wala data dekho ma'am.
Customer: Okay, jo three days ka hi hai abhi.
Executive: Haan, haan, haan, haan, ye dekho maine aapko bheja hai ma'am ek baar.
Customer: Ji, sir.
Executive: Haan, isko ma'am open karna ma'am ek baar mujhe.
Customer: Haan ji, sir.
Executive: Theek hai, abhi aap dekho ma'am jo maine kal hi bola tha, enquiry pe to main nahi karunga ya jis buyer ne call receive kari hai, nahi kari hai, call cut kar di, wo bhi ma'am usko bhi feedback nahi mil payega. Jis buyer ne aapko ye bola hai ki mujhe koi requirement nahi hai aur wo buyleads hai ma'am, theek hai? Main unpe, unko main verify karwa raha hoon. Ek baar aap dekho jo aapne 20 number pe ek jo buyer hai aapka, bottom.
Customer: Haan ji, sir. Bad.
Executive: Haan, bottom, haan, main dal di. Is buyer ka name kya hai? Yaha pe buyer ka name nahi likha hai, S by likha hua hai aapne.
Customer: Main, main sir abhi check kar leti hoon. Actually maine us hisab se likhe hai jis hisab se baad mein na wo mil jate hain.
Executive: Ye sahi hai, matlab buyer, yaha pe buyer ka name nahi hai, aapne jo teen ko jo transaction ki thi na buyleads ki, main aapko batata hoon aapne teen ko kaun kaun si transaction ki thi buyleads ki, main aapko name bata raha hoon aapko. Aapne teen ko ek, do, teen, total aapne char buyleads consume kiye ma'am, 3 November ko.
Customer: Haan ji, sir.
Executive: Theek hai, ek Yes ke naam mein buyer hai, ek Aditya Mandal naam se buyer hai, ek Ravikant Verma hai aur ek Harish Somani hai ma'am. Ye aapne lead consume kiya tha. Haan.
Customer: Ye jo ma'am, battan wala 20 number ka.
Executive: Haan, haan. Iska name hai Ramesh Mokashi.
Executive: Ek minute ruko, main likh leta hoon isme. Ramesh, to ye Ramesh wala aapne kaun si date ko consume kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Ye consume kiya 1 November ko.
Executive: Ek minute ruko, main likh leta hoon ma'am, aapne, aapne bola tha Ramesh, R A M E S, Ramesh, aage kya bola aapne?
Customer: Mokashi, M O K A S H I.
Executive: M O K A S H I aur ye aapne consume ki thi 11, 3 November ko, right?
Customer: Ji sir, actually 1 November ko sir ne kar li thi but maine inko call kari thi three ko.
Executive: Theek hai, koi baat nahi, main aapka wahi date galat likha hua hai na, to main verify kar raha tha na usi ma'am. To mere ko nahi nikal ke aa pa rahi thi waha par. Haan, ab main ab teen ke main transaction, ye aapne jo lead consume ki hogi, main teen ka transaction dekh raha hoon, teen ka transaction dekho aapne char lead consume kiya, pura aapko maine group mein share bhi kar diya maine. Aapne only ek consume kiya tha, isliye mujhe mil nahi pa raha tha na, inka mujhe kya hoga na, ab main aage share karunga wo team itna verified nahi karegi na, mujhe inka by list number nikalna padta hai, hamare na ek ID hoti hai by list ki.
Customer: Okay, okay. Sir actually, unke by list ke aage S likha hai na.
Executive: Haan, haan. Wo wahi by list hai jo sir ne pehle utha li thi but maine follow up liya tha baad mein kyunki us din to main available nahi thi.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ji, to jitni bhi S ke name se hai, by list ke aage S likha hai, unki jo dates hai wo uthane ki pehle ki hai. Bas ye hai ki follow up is din liya hai, jitni date likhi hai.
Executive: To ma'am ab simple si baat hai, is case mein to ab, ab aap bata do is case mein kya kar sakte hain? Ab jaise ma'am aapne lead aaj uthai hai, ab buyer ki requirement aaj thi, hum log call kar rahe hain ma'am usko kab? Next din, to definitely ma'am buyer mana karega ma'am. Sir ye to is baar, isliye ek din ka case hua na, but pehle to hum sath sath hi mein call karte hain tab bhi hume yahi reply aa raha hai, not required, not required.
Executive: Ye aapne mujhe jis jis date ka mujhe aapne bheja hai na ma'am, jo aapne mujhe abhi excel bheja hai. Ji.
Executive: Theek hai, haan main abhi only usi ki baat kar raha hoon main abhi, taki main abhi main isi ko pehle verify kar raha tha na to hume ek idea nikal ke aa jayega to maine ye issue maine identify kiya hai ma'am ki isme jo bhi aapne not required, not required ka jo option aa raha hai na wo direct enquiry jis buyer aapko message kiya us pe jyada aa raha hai ma'am, right?
Customer: Ji. Hai na? Aap dekh pa rahe hain ma'am, jitni bhi not required hai mostly wo direct enquiry hai aur by list mein to ma'am mujhe aapka abhi tak jo nikal ke aaya hai wo ek nikal ke aayega jo aapne mujhe bataya hai ki wo bhi jo requirement ma'am wo thi jis buyer ne aapne aaj consume ki us aapne kal call kiya us buyer ne bola ki mere ko not required hai. Lekin fir bhi main aapki santushti ke liye verify kar deta hoon, theek hai ma'am? Aapne 20 wala hai.
Customer: Aap check kijiye ek baar. Haan, haan, main aapse wahi keh raha hoon main aapse. Aur bhi hai not required.
Executive: Theek hai, main aur nikal raha hoon ab. Haan, aap apne hisab se ek baar check kar lijiye. Ab ye wala buyer chhod de raha hoon, ek minute rukiye ma'am, ye wala buyer chhod de raha hoon, dular already not required, ye chhod deta hoon, ek aapki by list hai, 26 number pe dekho ma'am ek baar.
Customer: 36 pe?
Executive: Nahi, nahi, nahi, 26, 26 mein.
Customer: 26. Haan ji. Haan, Khan, haan, jo Khan Mohammad jo naam hai na ma'am. Ye, ye lead hum logo ne ma'am kaun si date mein consume ki thi ma'am ye?
Customer: Ye I think one ya two November ki hogi.
Executive: 1 November ki na?
Customer: Ek ya do ki hogi sir, unme se ek se, ek ki hogi.
Executive: Ek ya do, chalo, theek hai, usme pehle.
Executive: Likh deta hoon. Naam yahi rahega na, Khan Mohammad na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai, iske baad, Khan Mohammad ho gaya aur aapka not required kaun sa hai iske baad? Ek minute ma'am, iske baad aapki enquiry hogi, chhod do isko. Fir aapki ek requirement hai, Mukesh naam ka ek buyer hai ma'am, ye lead bhi pakka humne use ki hogi humari. Date sahi nahi likhi thi isme. Jo Mukesh naam 28, 28. 28. Haan. Ye 28 nahi ma'am, ye to enquiry hai, 29, 29 dekho aap. Haan, 29, ye three ko hi hui hai.
Executive: Ye three ko hui na ma'am? Ye three ko hi hui hai aur 38 bhi three ko hui hai, 31st bhi three ko hi hui hai. Achha Ravikant Verma sahi hai. Ji. Ji. Jiske aage S nahi likha wo same dates ki hai. Haan, abhi dekho maine aapko bheja tha abhi screenshot usme lead number likha hai, ye lead number mujhe aage lekar bhejna padega ma'am isliye main aapka data nikal raha hoon ye sara. Theek hai, aap dekho. Koi nahi sir aap nikal lijiye.
Executive: Haan. Theek hai aur export ke liye aap kaam karoge ma'am aise koi dikkat nahi hai ma'am, dono follow karna hi padega aise lead nahi milte, lead sahi rahe na ma'am hum logo ko. Sir ab mujhe sir ne mana kiya lead uthane se export. Sir samajh nahi rahe problem yahi aa rahi, galti aapki nahi hai ma'am, aapko main bol bhi nahi raha. Aapne kaun kaun sa bola tha mujhe ek baar, hum log kahan tak pahunch gaye the, 28 tak pahunch gaye the na? 20 jo 30 wala hai, ye bhi, ye bhi usi wo teen ko hi hai na?
Executive: 30 wala? 31 bhi. Haan, ye 30 number pe hai, Aditya. Wo bhi same date pe hai aur 31 bhi same date pe hai. Theek hai. Niche sir jitni bhi ab by list hai na next wo sari same date ki hai. Theek hai. Isme se ek note, note na hua na 43 wo maine highlight nahi kiya hua, wo bhi note means hai not required. Haan. Chalo ma'am ek baar main ye update kar de raha hoon ma'am, theek hai? Aur aapke paas call aayegi, sir ko bol dena aaj available rahe. Theek hai? Ji sir, sir abhi yaha pe available nahi hai, agar unko call aayegi wo pick kar lenge. Theek hai ma'am. Main ye pura update kar de raha hoon sheet mein ma'am aur aapko group mein bhi aapko bhejta hoon first, theek hai lead number daal ke. Kis pe hum log kaam karenge wo uske aage likha hoga ma'am, theek hai lead number, jiske aage main lead number likhu unhi pe hum log kaam karenge, theek hai? Theek hai sir. Theek hai ma'am. Okay sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance with buyleads data.

- Wants clarification on 'Not Required' leads.

- Wants to know about lead consumption dates.



Resolution:

- Executive verified and clarified buylead data.

- Executive identified discrepancies in lead dates.

- Executive explained lead verification process.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update the sheet.

- Customer will receive a call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, verification, data, follow up, enquiry
